product_name: Core Concepts Cowboy Pow Jacket - Men's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: Highly wind-resistant, warm and packable, the men's Core Concepts Cowboy Pow Jacket is ideal for cool- and cold-weather outdoor activities. Heavyweight, hard-faced, Polartec(R) Wind Pro(R) traps heat efficiently, while its enhanced water-repellent exterior sheds light rain and snow. Brushed fleece-like interior offers soft comfort and moisture-management. Warm your hands and store often-used items in the large twin external zip pockets; secure cards and cash in the hidden zippered stash pocket at side seam. Thin stretch panels under arms and along sides vent excess body heat away from the body core. Core Concepts Cowboy Pow Jacket has a drawcord hem that seals out cold while trapping in warmth. Overstock.
short_description: Highly wind-resistant, warm and packable, the men's Core Concepts Cowboy Pow Jacket is ideal for cool- and cold-weather outdoor activities.
